name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens further scanned the phishing website and found that it was a server built by the open source project Gophish

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At noon on April 6, a mother came to the north gate of the Jiulonghu Campus of Southeast University to commemorate her son who committed suicide on campus in 2021. A police officer nearby shielded her with a black umbrella.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 4, Xue Wei, former director of the orchestral department of the Central Conservatory of Music in Beijing and a violinist living in the UK, publicly reported that the current director of the orchestral department, Tong Weidong, had accepted bribes, solicited prostitution and had an extramarital affair. He also said that he was selling a university position for 1.5 million. On April 5, multiple WeChat public accounts reposted this news, but all articles about this incident on all public account platforms have been removed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 6, a Ningbo netizen said that he was at home talking to Singapore's United Overseas Bank about work, and then the Anti-Fraud Center contacted him through his friend, asking him why he called Singapore and threatening him that the local police would find him.
Because of his bad attitude during the communication process with the Anti-Fraud Center and the local police, all his bank cards and Alipay accounts were frozen that night.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger said that currently in Zhejiang, any overseas phone call that lasts more than ten minutes and involves money will be treated as fraud.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 6, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Hangzhou South Railway Station was jammed with passengers exiting the station due to multiple trains arriving at the same time, and some people broke down doors to escape.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hefei has also started to see 24-hour bridge guards
On April 7, a Hefei netizen filmed police and volunteers guarding the overpass and posted a video asking "Why is there a police officer on every overpass in Hefei?"
In response to this, local netizens in the comment section said they had also seen bridge guards on overpasses recently.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 7, Dongguan, Guangdong. The government is renovating Huolianshu Village into an urban village. Villagers hang a banner on the upper floor that reads "Protect our homeland to the death". According to villagers, they know that the demolition of Huolianshu Village will affect the urban appearance of Dongguan, but village cadres have never talked to villagers about the demolition. Instead, they came directly to demolish houses. They also directly planned the property rights of villagers as the village collective, resulting in the villagers not receiving any compensation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 6, Jialecheng Life Plaza, Lili Town, Wujiang District, Suzhou.
All owners boycotted the developer for colluding with the property management company to charge unreasonable underground garage parking fees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 6, in Xingguo, Jiangxi, a new store opened with flower baskets at the door, and the urban management department came to collect road occupation fees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 6, in Xiaoyi, Shanxi, a video of a girl being punched, kicked and stripped of her clothes by several people sparked indignation among local residents and was forwarded by many people. The video showed that the girl kept begging for mercy, "I'm sorry, I was wrong," but the bullies around her not only did not stop, but also stripped the girl's clothes and kept insulting her. The girl was finally carried to the hospital for treatment. On April 7, the Xiaoyi Municipal Government issued a notice that all 11 people involved in the case had been brought to justice, and the main criminal suspects Fan, Ren, and Feng were detained in accordance with the law; Li and seven others were detained in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today, the official account of the Hubei Communist Youth League, "Youth Hubei", released a video. The caption "We are so strong this season, very strong!" triggered a heated discussion in the comment section, calling for a decisive battle with Japan and the United States to unify the world.
"Season 3" is a new meme recently, with netizens using the S1, S2, and S3 seasons in the game to compare the First, Second, and Third World Wars.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/THCn0AakB8

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 6 (Released) Chengdu, Sichuan.
Shuangfa Tianxi Center real estate project was left unfinished, and the owners stood on the roof of the sales office holding banners and shouting "We want to go home"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A teenager posted a video saying that he was blamed by his father after he reported the school cafeteria hygiene problem, thinking that he would be "buried" in the school in the future.
The teenager said that he didn't care about being bullied, "If there is something, just say it, don't care about those useless so-called social etiquette... Why can't we speak for ourselves?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Anji Dalu Music Festival, waving rainbow flags

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: When the rejuvenation pills were launched that night, a "Taiwan, China" flag was raised at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 3, in Changchun, Jilin, the owners of Wanda's unfinished building gathered together and shouted the slogan "Give me back my house", and some owners stood on the roof and wanted to jump off the building to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 7 (Released) Chenzhou, Hunan. A group of illegal taxi drivers threatened passengers to cancel Didi orders at the Didi stop next to the station, and even beat passengers. 
At present, the local transportation bureau responded that it is verifying the situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 31, in Renshou County, Meishan, Sichuan, an 11-year-old girl was killed on her way to find her classmates. On the afternoon of April 1, the police found the body in the back of a house in the wetland park. At 21:00 on the same day, the suspect Xu (male, 38 years old) was arrested by the police. On April 6, the suspect's home was still surrounded by people, and the window glass in his home was smashed and the fence was pushed down.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of April 7, at Shandong Jiaotong University, it was reported online that someone entered the office of the Mechanical and Electrical Building with a knife and slit the throat of a teacher.
(It was previously rumored that the perpetrator was a woman, but the video that circulated later showed that the arrested person was a man)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some students said that the reason for the attack was because they failed the course.
But the man in the video looked older.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 7, someone stopped a car on the street in Linfen, Shanxi, and beat people and smashed the car with a baseball bat.
The police reported on the same day that all the people involved in the case have been arrested and the case is under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to @TopuzzoC, on April 5, animal protection organizations around the world held protests against the domestic cat abuse incidents in recent years, calling on China to find ways to protect animals as soon as possible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@iStudyUA @TopuzzoC There are many organizations that care about human rights in China. Every year, there are many discussions and protests on human rights issues in China. There are also many human rights organization accounts on Twitter, both in English and Chinese. It’s just that no one cares much.
I suggest that friends who feel that their human rights have been neglected can first pay attention to the tag #個人一推 to see how many voices shouting for us we have ignored.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 7, Wuhan Wanda Hanyin delayed the delivery of houses, and the owners went to the sales office to protest and protect their rights.
It is reported that the contract originally scheduled the delivery of houses at the end of 2023, and the owners were notified in January 2024 that the houses would be delivered at the end of March, but the day before yesterday, they were notified that the delivery would be postponed and no clear time was given.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that Wanda Hanyin is a large luxury house located in the center of Wuhan, with a selling price of more than 40,000 yuan per square meter.
